presentationPage.description: CareCode provides emergency responders instant access to your vital medical information through a simple QR code sticker. Because in an emergency, every second counts.

howItWorksPage.title: How CareCode works
howItWorksPage.subtitle: A simple four-step process that could save your life in an emergency

1.title: Create Your Profile
1.description: Enter your medical information, emergency contacts, and other vital details securely in our system.

2.title: Receive your CareCode sticker
2.description: We'll send you durable, waterproof QR code sticker that you can place on your belongings or wear as a bracelet.

3.title: First responsers scan
3.description: In an emergency, medical professionals scan your QR code with any smartphone to access your critical information.

4.title: Faster, better care
4.description: Responders can provide appropriate treatment immediately, avoiding harmful interactions and contacting your loved ones.

faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.subtitle: Everything you need to know about CareCode

q1.question: How does CareCode store my information?
q1.answer: Your information is stored in secure, encrypted databases, and you control exactly what information is accessible when your QR code is scanned.

q2.question: How do I update my medical information?
q2.answer: You can update your information anytime through the portal app by logging into your account. Changes are instantly reflected when your QR code is scanned, without needing to replace your stickers or products.

q3.question: Can I use CareCode for my children or elderly parents?
q3.answer: Absolutely! CareCode is perfect for children, elderly individuals, or anyone who might not be able to communicate their medical needs in an emergency.

q4.question: What happens if my QR code is scanned by someone other than medical personnel?
q4.answer: You control what information is visible. By default, all your relevant medical information is shared when the QR code is scanned
